about_the_game:
The world is ending - yet even the darkest moments hold beauty within them.
Set in the whimsical world of Baruu, you take on the role of a young photographer and help peculiar characters accept their fate by fulfilling their final wishes.

Design

The world is your canvas. Vignette offers you a plethora of options for you to design, frame and shoot your photos. Use and unlock a bunch of lenses and camera settings to personalize the way you capture the world around you - all while being easy to use for absolute photography beginners and very familiar for long-time photographers. Fill out your album and complete quests however you prefer, the design process is completely up to you!

Connect

Meet a diverse and memorable cast. With the end of the world inching closer and closer, not everyone in Baruu has fulfilled their dreams, goals and ambitions - and some will need your help to do so. Dozens of unique characters offer special quests for you to complete, all of them using your camera in creative ways. Help the postman make his final deliveries and snap a picture of the package at the correct spot. Uncover and capture long-forgotten locations while helping a wanderer planning his last trip. Find and photograph every hidden pidgeon in the city for the.. guy living in a dumpster..? Meet, bond and have fun with the many people of Baruu - some rather strange and some a bit more normal.

Explore

Venture out into a sprawling semi-open world. From deep autumn forests, open fields and far-reaching lakes to underground mushroom-filled caves, flooded grottos and trees piercing the clouds above - Baruu is everything your inner adventurer could wish for. Everything is designed by hand, so pick a direction, wander off, get lost in the environment and return with a now pages long photo album.

Features

  • Semi-Open World: Explore a sector-based Open World, using bus stations to travel between locations.
  • Meet People: Make friends with a broad cast of characters from several nationalities, genders and backgrounds to uncover deep, personal stories.
  • Unique Visuals: Feel nostalgic with aesthetics heavily inspired by 90s anime.
  • Discover Secrets: Baruu is full of hidden nooks and crannies - you just have to know where to look.
